Plot: A Music Video VHS/DVD, with behind the scenes, interviews, and 2 music videos "Uh-Huh" and "Gots Ta Be" featuring the R&B Quartet B2K. Special Appearances by IMx, Jhene, Chris Stokes, and TG4.
Title: Introducing B2K
Director: Harri Mark, Thomas Snyder, Dave Meyers, Erik White
Actors: Omarion Grandberry, Lil' Fizz, J-Boog, Raz B
